articles.content: Dave Grohl presents himself as a rock historian and evangelist, but his real project is perseverance. On a certain level, his career has been defined by what hes been able to build while everything a… [+6252 chars]

articles.author: Alaka Sahani
articles.title: Scoop review: Powerful retelling of a real-life crime, this show puts the spotlight on media and mafia - The Indian Express
articles.description: Scoop review: Director Hansal Mehta zooms in on a spine-chilling murder case that uncovers a complex web involving the media, underworld and the Mumbai Police.
articles.content: It’s the thrill of chasing a possible Page 1 byline or a ‘scoop’ that keeps most newspaper reporters going in spite of the risks involved. These risks range from sacrificing family time, long hours a… [+3153 chars]

articles.author: Will Bedingfield
articles.title: Why Hollywood Really Fears Generative AI - WIRED
articles.description: Unions representing actors and writers are negotiating with major studios to stop AI from running riot in the industry. Their concerns are very real.
articles.content: The nature of the impact on performers is unique, especially with generative AI tools that can be used to recreate a performer image, likeness, or voice persona, or to do things that they didnt origi… [+3741 chars]
